name: Six Years
description:
You are in the most dangerous road in the world, please dodge all obstacles as carefully as possible.

**Control**
Tilt or turn your device to move car left and right to avoid the obstacles moving towards him and maintain social distancing at all time as he rushes home. The game uses your device's gyroscope, accelerometer, or gyroscope for movement.

**Leaderboard**
Compete with the scores of other players in the world to have your name listed on the online leaderboard! If you're on it, you have the bragging rights for sure!

Proudly a Malaysian game

This game was designed and developed in Malaysia. 100% Malaysian.
